column1: Dataset*null*null*null*http://rs.tdwg.org/plinC/terms/index.htm#Dataset * http://rs.pliniancore.org/terms/index.htm#Dataset * http://code.google.com/p/pliniancore/wiki/Dataset * Root element from which all other elements will branch from

The defined audiences are: Biodiversity researchers
column4: professionals from another areas and general public.

column1: Audience*NormalString*null*unbounded*http://rs.tdwg.org/plinC/terms/index.htm#Audience * http://rs.pliniancore.org/terms/index.htm#Audience * http://code.google.com/p/pliniancore/wiki/Audience * Repetitive concept where the target audiences are written one by one. (Predetermined list: 01. Biodiversity researchers. 02. Teachers and students. 03. Decision makers. 04. Professionals from another areas. 05. General public.)

column2: revision status and dates of the entire data collection from which the current dataset is derived from abcd: RevisonData.

Abstract*TextDescriptionType*0*null*http://rs.tdwg.org/plinC/terms/index.htm#Abstract * http://rs.pliniancore.org/terms/index.htm#Abstract * http://code.google.com/p/pliniancore/wiki/Abstract * General description of the taxon. This concept could point out any information about the taxon. Its main goal is summarize the most relevant or attractive characteristics of this taxon to the general public.

NomenclatureAndClassification*null*0*null*http://rs.tdwg.org/plinC/terms/index.htm#NomenclatureAndClassification * http://rs.pliniancore.org/terms/index.htm#NomenclatureAndClassification * http://code.google.com/p/pliniancore/wiki/NomenclatureAndClassification * Standard information for every known taxon.

column2: as well as the conservation status

column6: etc. It includes published material or suggestions from the author or others. In any event
column7: the source must be explicitly quoted.

column1: VernacularNameUseAnnotations*null*0*null*http://rs.tdwg.org/plinC/terms/index.htm#VernacularNameUseAnnotations * http://rs.pliniancore.org/terms/index.htm#VernacularNameUseAnnotations * http://code.google.com/p/pliniancore/wiki/VernacularNameUseAnnotations * Acc. column2: presented in a simple technical language
column3: to distinguish the species from other close or similar ones.

column1: Habit*TextDescriptionType*0*null*http://rs.tdwg.org/plinC/terms/index.htm#Habit * http://rs.pliniancore.org/terms/index.htm#Habit * http://code.google.com/p/pliniancore/wiki/Habit * General appearance. Characteristic mode of growth or occurrence associated to its environment
column2: particularly for plants. Comprising its size

Reproduction*TextDescriptionType*0*null*http://rs.tdwg.org/plinC/terms/index.htm#Reproduction * http://rs.pliniancore.org/terms/index.htm#Reproduction * http://code.google.com/p/pliniancore/wiki/Reproduction * All data related to the production of offspring.
